stg_parsedText:
TEXT_FROM_FILE_NAME:PIM000000425-COLOR CLAY Natural Brochure.pdf 


## Page 1

COLOR CLAY
N
T
A
U
R
A
L
Natural Mediterranean Beauty

## Page 2

Be Mediterranean
Color Clay® is born on the Mediterranean shore
in Barcelona's area; an environment surrounded
by nature, brightness and freshness.
Our clays feature a wide range of extraordinary
natural colours and a great richness in minerals
which are beneficial for the skin.
The Mediterranean lifestyle is characterized by
its taste for wellbeing, healthy habits and its
historical beauty and body worship.
Color Clay® brings together all these attributes in
the form of clay to provide personal care with a
piece of this unique and exclusive land.
Be Natural
Here, in the warmth of our land, clays have been
identified, analysed and their purity has been
discovered.
Color Clay® product range is 100% natural, no
additives or chemicals have been added in its
manufacturing process.
Approaching traditional methods has allowed
the clay to keep its region authenticity and
guaranteeing the essence of our well-being.
Color Clay® is the Mediterranean purest treasure
unearthed for the cosmetic industry ..

## Page 3

Product Range

## Page 4

Properties
Color Clay® range of products have different
composition and morphology depending on their
source. Nevertheless, they all have some common
characteristics that provide outstanding properties to
finished formulations:
Colour range
Its different composition provides a full range of natural
stable colouring agents for formulating. It gives a
special attraction that evokes its origins in the warm
coasts of the Mediterranean.
Natural ingredient
Completely natural without additives, Color Clay®
brings earth essentials close to personal care industry.
A gift from ancient nature worth to apply into cosmetic
products.
Absorption capacity
Laminar silicate is the main crystal structure. Color
Clay® is mechanically processed and finely grinded
below 44 microns. Its high specific surface makes it an
agent with excellent absorptive capabilities.
Improved skin feel
Its laminar platelet structure and very small particle size
gives an excellent spreadability. This contributes to the
formula providing smooth and pleasant texture.
Mechanical cleanser
Combines perfectly with the cleansing effect of
surfactants, complementing it with mild mechanical
effect provided by the soft particle of the clay. Clean
skin, impurities free.
Dead cell renewal
The small particle size of the clay enables to formulate
products with a mild exfoliating effect that drags the
dead cells when rinsed off, helping the cell renewal of
the skin.
,
Rich in minerals
Extraordinary rich in minerals, similar to the skin and
cell constituents.

## Page 5

Uses
Color Clay® is one of the most versatile cosmetic
ingredient available. It can directly be mixed with water
or other cosmetic ingredients to obtain a paste for facial
masks, body SPA treatments; or can be easily formulated
into several cosmetic products as creamy masks, soaps,
emulsions and shampoos.
Natural facial and body wraps
Mixed with water, oils and actives, Color Clay®
produces an homogenous paste that is easily
spreadable as a wrap for wellness treatments. Pure
nature for natural therapies.
Physical cleanser in mild
surfactant systems
It complements the washing action in make up
removers, micellar waters, cleansing milks and
shampoos with a mild physical cleansing effect.
Colouring range for soaps
It offers natural colours to soap bars and liquid soap
formulations, stable at any pH. Nine different colours
awaken the formulator creativity.
Mild natural exfoliator for
creams and serums
Its small particle size below 44 microns allows a gentle
exfoliating effect. Used in creams and serums it is an
extraordinary soft dead cell renewal.
Oil absorber in facial masks
Its high silicate content combined with its high specific
surface, provides the clay with a high oil adsorption
capacity. Clay brings refreshing effect to the skin after
soaking up the excess of sebum.
Natural colouring agent for
colour cosmetics and make up
Used in colour cosmetics Color Clay® gives shade or
base colour providing naturalness and originality to
make up. Not being a pigment, it does not have a Cl.
Due to its natural origin colour, shade may slightly
change from batch to batch.

## Page 6

Be Sustainable
Colorclay S.L. is fully involved within the environment though the reforestation
and establishment of livestock areas in the quarries.
This recovery involves returning to productive land by allowing the recuperation
of the mineral properties and implementing forests, preserving the environment
and contributing to the oxygen generation. Sustainability is our concern.
We return to the earth what it has been given to us.
COLOR CLAY

gpt_manufacturer_or_supplier_reason: The document states on page 6 that Colorclay S.L. is involved in environmental sustainability related to Color Clay, indicating it is the manufacturer or supplier. Additionally, the product range is distributed worldwide by DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U., but the manufacturer is Colorclay S.L.
gpt_select_industry_cluster_reason: Selected Personal Care because the document explicitly mentions Color Clay® as a natural ingredient for cosmetic products, including facial masks, body SPA treatments, creams, serums, shampoos, and makeup. It highlights benefits such as skin cleansing, exfoliation, oil absorption, and natural coloring for cosmetics, all of which are directly related to personal care applications. There is no mention of use in homecare or institutional cleaning products.
gpt_select_compositions_reason: Selected Mineral because the document repeatedly mentions the product as clay with extraordinary mineral richness, laminar silicate crystal structure, and natural minerals beneficial for the skin. No mention of biomolecules, synthetic substances, derived natural extracts, or vegetal sources is present.
gpt_select_functions_reason: Selected Cleanser because the document mentions Color Clay® complements surfactants' cleansing effect and provides mild physical cleansing. Selected Exfoliant because it states the product has a mild exfoliating effect due to small particle size and helps dead cell renewal. Selected Skin Sensory Additive because the product improves skin feel with excellent spreadability and smooth texture. Selected Texturizer because the laminar platelet structure and fine particle size contribute to smooth and pleasant texture in formulations.
gpt_select_applications_reason: Selected Color Care because the document mentions Color Clay® as a natural colouring agent for colour cosmetics and make up. Selected Hair Care because it can be formulated into shampoos and complements cleansing in mild surfactant systems. Selected Skin Care due to its properties for mild exfoliation, dead cell renewal, mineral richness, and mechanical cleansing for skin. Selected Soap & Bath because it is used as a natural colouring range for soaps and can be formulated into soaps and emulsions. Selected Spa & Wellness because the product is used in natural facial and body wraps and body SPA treatments as described in the document. Other applications are not mentioned or supported by the document.
gpt_cas_from_doc_reason: The document provides detailed information about the Color Clay product range from Colorclay S.L., including origin, properties, uses, and sustainability, but does not mention any CAS Registry Number for the product or its components.
gpt_physical_form_reason: Selected Powder because the document mentions that Color Clay® is mechanically processed and finely ground below 44 microns, and images show clay powders in glass vials and wooden spoons, indicating the product is in powder form.
gpt_gen_product_description: Color Clay® from Colorclay S.L. is a 100% natural Mediterranean clay range, finely ground below 44 microns, offering a variety of stable natural colors and rich mineral content. Its laminar silicate structure provides excellent absorption, mild exfoliation, and a smooth texture, making it ideal for facial masks, body treatments, soaps, and gentle cleansing products. This versatile clay enhances skin renewal, absorbs oils, and supports natural cosmetic formulations without additives or chemicals.
gpt_recommended_dosage_reason: No specific recommended dosage instructions, amounts, frequencies, or administration routes are mentioned for Color Clay in the provided document.
gpt_certifications_reason: Selected Natural Cosmetic because the document states the product range is 100% natural with no additives or chemicals added, emphasizing natural purity for cosmetic use. Selected Vegan because the product is described as purely natural clay with no additives or animal-derived ingredients, implying suitability for vegan use.
gpt_claims_reason: Selected Natural Cosmetic because the document states the product range is 100% natural with no additives or chemicals. Selected Sebum Control because the document mentions high oil adsorption capacity and refreshing effect after soaking up excess sebum. Selected Skin Renewal because the document describes mild exfoliating effect and dead cell renewal properties. Selected Smoothing because the document highlights excellent spreadability and smooth, pleasant texture in formulations.
gpt_health_benefits_reason: Only applicable for FBI business line
